description: This header file declares exported API functions for the Transport Layer Security (TLS) cryptographic provider, including creation, removal, enrollment, and initialization functions.

methods.name: TlsCreateCryptoProvider
methods.description: Creates and initializes a TLS cryptographic provider object.

methods.name: TlsCpoCreate
methods.description: Constructs a new instance of the TLS Crypto Provider object.

methods.name: TlsCpoRemove
methods.description: Removes and cleans up the TLS Crypto Provider object.

methods.name: TlsCpoEnrollObjects
methods.description: Enrolls necessary sub-objects or components within the provider.

methods.name: TlsCpoInitialize
methods.description: Initializes the TLS Crypto Provider object after creation.
